message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! It's a one-of-a-kind item that I think you'll really love. I'm willing to sell it to you for $120.
I'm really interested in the product, but $120 is a bit out of my budget. Would you be willing to sell it to me for $90?
Thank you for your offer, Bob! I understand that $120 might be a bit steep, but I'm willing to meet you halfway. I can sell the product to you for $110.
I appreciate the compromise, but $110 is still a bit out of my budget. Would you be willing to sell it to me for $95?
I understand that you're trying to get the best deal, Bob. I'm willing to make another compromise. I can sell the product to you for $105.
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but $105 is still a bit too high for me. Would you be willing to sell it to me for $98?
I'm getting close to my minimum price, Bob. I'm willing to make one more compromise. I can sell the product to you for $102.
